name: WP MailScout
author: Themesgrove

sections.description:
WordPress Email Outreach Plugin

MailScout provides a gmail based email delivery service that assists businesses with email delivery. The service manages various types of email including shipping notifications, friend requests, sign-up confirmations, and email newsletters. Additionally, the company provides link tracking, open rate reporting.

MailScout is useful for :

  • Lead Generation
  • Email outreach
  • Influence Marketing
  • Digital Marketing
  • CPA (Cost per action) Marketing
  • Affiliate Marketing
  • Blog Outreach
  • Email Newsletter

Features

  • Easy setup
  • Add subscriber by CSV file.
  • Manually add Subscriber.
  • Add new subscriber group.
  • Update old subscriber.
  • Add email through Gmail API.
  • Add Multiple Email (Pro).
  • Classic editor for compose message.
  • Add followup message.
  • Pre loaded email template.
  • 100+ Email template (Pro).
  • Final preview before send.
  • Set campaign as a reply tracker.
  • Send whenever you want
  • Click tracking
  • Open tracking
  • Send and Lead status
  • Lot of customization and easy to use.
  • Well decorated.
  • Add multiple user on demand.
  • User friendly structure.
  • And much more…
sections.installation:
1. Install MailScout either via the WordPress.org plugin repository or by uploading the files to your server.
  2. Activate MailScout.
sections.changelog:
0.1.1 – beta

  • Updated feature lists.
  • Updated Screenshots.
  • Updated tested Version.

0.1 – beta

  • Beta release
